name: cicada

a large insect found in warm countries that produces a high continuous sound

Add to word list
Add to word list
a large insect with transparent wings which it rubs together to produce a high, continuous sound esp. when the weather is hot: Cicadas buzzing in the maple trees is the sound of hot summer.
